short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get more out of your SaaS tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hapstack helps your company keep track of which SaaS tools (e.g. Notion, Slack, HubSpot) you and your colleagues are using. It ensures that you're all using the best applications and that no money is being wasted on duplicate tools. 

Please note that Hapstack only tracks browsing data for common SaaS providers. All other browsing data will remain on your device. We only track whether an application was used or not, up to once per day - no other data or content is collected.
